channel.title: Black Mesa's Doppleganger
channel.description:
I didn't know where to post this, I am extremely sorry!
Anyways, I just wanted to show how this clothing store's logo near where I live is similar to the black mesa logo:
[img]https://img688.imageshack.us/img688/6308/buildingy.jpg[/img]
The place is even called, "Plateau Clothing," which is just like Black Mesa because Mesas and Plateaus are very similar. Both are geological features; plateaus and mesas are sudden elevations around plain areas. Both have top flat surfaces.
It isn't really important I know, "Who cares." However, I find it a bit funny.
I'd also like to say hello to the BM community! I have been following this mod for about 6-7 years but never made an account. I'm an avid fan of everything valve related, except for maybe Ricochet. (Just my opinion) :stuck_out_tongue:
I love Half Life and I anticipate this mods release, hopefully sometime late this year or 2013!

item.title: Black Mesa's Doppleganger
item.dc:creator: HawkeyE
item.description:
acade365:

yeah, that sounds about right

The store obviously only sells clothing which are of a particular style that has already plateaued in the fashion world.

item.description:
Black Mesa is actually a front for a old man and his slave laborers who entertain an outlandish fetish for running around the desert drenching the landforms with tar

That Makes clothes.
For Plateaus.
When it is cold.

Does that Help?

item.title: Black Mesa's Doppleganger
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
Shnazliztur:

I think sersoft presented an excellent opportunity for those wanting to properly speak the English language! Just lurk around the forums for a few months & in no time will you not only be able to structure your sentences, you’ll also know proper punctuation! I’m sure the employees over at various translation software companies are starting to notice holes in their pockets.

All except Google employees, their pockets are too deep…

Read full topic

Well English is my first language, so i guess that makes me a bit of a language newb.

item.title: Black Mesa's Doppleganger
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
I admit, we do have a high standard of language here. But once you spend about 7 years on these forums, you’ll be doing all of your friends’ English homework. You will be able to spell, and touchtype fast like a baus. :lol:

Sorry to derail, and welcome to the forums!

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa's Doppleganger
item.dc:creator: SwingNet
item.description:
FERGUS:

When I saw this line I went :what: because I thought you meant the pronunciation. Got me wondering how the hell you pronounce plateau.
There shouldn’t be any apostrophes there.

Sorry for the typo, I get scared when I post online lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa's Doppleganger

item.description:

item.title: Black Mesa's Doppleganger
item.dc:creator: Gasher
item.description:
Maybe the devs should fire over a memo to their in-house legal dept… who in turn will send a cease and desist letter pronto. That should resolve this blatant IP infringement! How dare they piggyback on BMS’s use of large earthen objects AND the colors BLACK and WHITE!!.. Inside of a circle, I might add!

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa's Doppleganger

item.description:
You’re wrong. I go to Mesa’s place all the time.

item.title: Black Mesa's Doppleganger
item.dc:creator: FERGUS
item.description:
Rusty Lambda:

The place is even called, “Plateau Clothing,” which is just like Black Mesa because Mesa’s and Plateau’s are very similar.

When I saw this line I went :what: because I thought you meant the pronunciation. Got me wondering how the hell you pronounce plateau.
There shouldn’t be any apostrophes there.

Read full topic
